Client.Name: Super-Resolution for Renewable Energy Resource Data with Climate Change Impacts

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Sup3rCC is downscaled Global Climate Model (GCM) data. For example, the initial file set tagged "sup3rcc_conus_mriesm20_ssp585_r1i1p1f1" is downscaled from MRI ESM 2.0 for climate change scenario SSP5 8.5 and variant label r1i1p1f1. The downscaling process is performed using a generative machine learning approach called sup3r: Super-Resolution for Renewable Energy Resource Data. The data includes both historical and future weather years, although the historical years represent the historical average climate, not true historical weather. The Sup3rCC data is intended to help researchers study the impact of climate change on energy systems with high levels of wind and solar power generation. Please note that all climate change data is only a representation of the possible future climate and contains significant uncertainty. Analysis of multiple climate change scenarios and multiple climate models can help quantify this uncertainty.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Sup3rCC is downscaled Global Climate Model (GCM) data. For example, the initial file set tagged "sup3rcc_conus_mriesm20_ssp585_r1i1p1f1" is downscaled from MRI ESM 2.0 for climate change scenario SSP5 8.5 and variant label r1i1p1f1. The downscaling process is performed using a generative machine learning approach called sup3r: Super-Resolution for Renewable Energy Resource Data. The data includes both historical and future weather years, although the historical years represent the historical average climate, not true historical weather. The Sup3rCC data is intended to help researchers study the impact of climate change on energy systems with high levels of wind and solar power generation. Please note that all climate change data is only a representation of the possible future climate and contains significant uncertainty. Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We developed our own platform using tools developed by Venus. In terms of data retrieval, the feature is to use scripts to traverse and execute. In terms of data download, we download the data according to the AWS command line. After downloading, we use the open source go-graphsplit of the fileddrive-team to cut it into small files of a specified size. The csv file will store the piece_cid and size information corresponding to the source file.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Shipping hard drives, HTTP or FTP server
